revised_title: Investigation of Ova Changes in Mammals after Impregnation and Chorion Formation
tldr: The author examines the changes in mammalian ova after impregnation, focusing on the development of the chorion. The study includes observations on rabbits and draws similar conclusions for human ova. The author also investigates the changes in the vitellus and the role of the germinal vesicle in the development process.
